Title: The Fighter
Production_Co: Closest to the Hole Productions, Fighter, Mandeville Films
Cast: Mark Wahlberg, Christian Bale, Amy Adams, Melissa Leo, Mickey O'Keefe, Jack McGee, Melissa McMeekin, Bianca Hunter, Erica McDermott, Jill Quigg, Dendrie Taylor, Kate B. O'Brien, Jenna Lamia, Frank Renzulli, Paul Campbell
Plot: A look at the early years of boxer "Irish" Micky Ward and his brother who helped train him before going pro in the mid 1980s. The Fighter is a drama about boxer "Irish" Micky Ward's unlikely road to the world light welterweight title. His Rocky-like rise was shepherded by half-brother Dicky, a boxer-turned-trainer on the verge of being KO'd by drugs and crime. Written by anonymous
Keywords: boxing, boxer, crack cocaine, lowell massachusetts, domineering mother
Actors: Mark Wahlberg, Christian Bale, Amy Adams
Writer: Scott Silver (screenplay), Paul Tamasy (screenplay) | 4 more credits »
Description: Directed by David O. Russell.  With Mark Wahlberg, Christian Bale, Amy Adams, Melissa Leo. A look at the early years of boxer "Irish" Micky Ward and his brother who helped train him before going pro in the mid 1980s.
